net.opentsdb.uid

类 UniqueId

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.opentsdb.uid.UniqueId
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    UniqueIdInterface

    public final class UniqueId
extends Object
implements UniqueIdInterface
    Represents a table of Unique IDs, manages the lookup and creation of IDs.

    Don't attempt to use equals() or hashCode() on this class.

    另请参阅:
    UniqueIdInterface

    • 构造器详细资料

      • UniqueId

        public UniqueId(org.hbase.async.HBaseClient client,
                byte[] table,
                String kind,
                int width)
        Constructor.
        参数:
        client - The HBase client to use.
        table - The name of the HBase table to use.
        kind - The kind of Unique ID this instance will deal with.
        width - The number of bytes on which Unique IDs should be encoded.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if width is negative or too small/large or if kind is an empty string.

      • UniqueId

        public UniqueId(org.hbase.async.HBaseClient client,
                byte[] table,
                String kind,
                int width,
                boolean randomize_id)
        Constructor.
        参数:
        client - The HBase client to use.
        table - The name of the HBase table to use.
        kind - The kind of Unique ID this instance will deal with.
        width - The number of bytes on which Unique IDs should be encoded.
        randomize_id - Whether or not to randomize new UIDs
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if width is negative or too small/large or if kind is an empty string.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.2

      • UniqueId

        public UniqueId(TSDB tsdb,
                byte[] table,
                String kind,
                int width,
                boolean randomize_id)
        Constructor.
        参数:
        tsdb - The TSDB this UID object belongs to
        table - The name of the HBase table to use.
        kind - The kind of Unique ID this instance will deal with.
        width - The number of bytes on which Unique IDs should be encoded.
        randomize_id - Whether or not to randomize new UIDs
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if width is negative or too small/large or if kind is an empty string.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.3

      • getName

        public String getName(byte[] id)
               throws NoSuchUniqueId,
                      org.hbase.async.HBaseException
        Finds the name associated with a given ID.

        This method is blocking. Its use within OpenTSDB itself is discouraged, please use getNameAsync(byte[]) instead.

        指定者:
        getName 在接口中 UniqueIdInterface
        参数:
        id - The ID associated with that name.
        抛出:
        NoSuchUniqueId - if the given ID is not assigned.
        org.hbase.async.HBaseException - if there is a problem communicating with HBase.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the ID given in argument is encoded on the wrong number of bytes.
        另请参阅:
        getId(String), getOrCreateId(String)

      • getNameAsync

        public com.stumbleupon.async.Deferred<String> getNameAsync(byte[] id)
        Finds the name associated with a given ID.
        参数:
        id - The ID associated with that name.
        抛出:
        NoSuchUniqueId - if the given ID is not assigned.
        org.hbase.async.HBaseException - if there is a problem communicating with HBase.

        从以下版本开始:
        1.1
        另请参阅:

      • getId

        public byte[] getId(String name)
             throws NoSuchUniqueName,
                    org.hbase.async.HBaseException
        从接口复制的说明: UniqueIdInterface
        Finds the ID associated with a given name.

        The length of the byte array is fixed in advance by the implementation.

        指定者:
        getId 在接口中 UniqueIdInterface
        参数:
        name - The name to lookup in the table.
        返回:
        A non-null, non-empty byte[] array.
        抛出:
        NoSuchUniqueName - if the name requested doesn't have an ID assigned.
        org.hbase.async.HBaseException - if there is a problem communicating with HBase.
        另请参阅:
        UniqueIdInterface.getName(byte[])

      • getIdAsync

        public com.stumbleupon.async.Deferred<byte[]> getIdAsync(String name)

      • getOrCreateId

        public byte[] getOrCreateId(String name)
                     throws org.hbase.async.HBaseException
        Finds the ID associated with a given name or creates it.

        This method is blocking. Its use within OpenTSDB itself is discouraged, please use getOrCreateIdAsync(java.lang.String) instead.

        The length of the byte array is fixed in advance by the implementation.

        指定者:
        getOrCreateId 在接口中 UniqueIdInterface
        参数:
        name - The name to lookup in the table or to assign an ID to.
        抛出:
        org.hbase.async.HBaseException - if there is a problem communicating with HBase.
        IllegalStateException - if all possible IDs are already assigned.
        IllegalStateException - if the ID found in HBase is encoded on the wrong number of bytes.

      • getOrCreateIdAsync

        public com.stumbleupon.async.Deferred<byte[]> getOrCreateIdAsync(String name)
        Finds the ID associated with a given name or creates it.

        The length of the byte array is fixed in advance by the implementation.

        参数:
        name - The name to lookup in the table or to assign an ID to.
        抛出:
        org.hbase.async.HBaseException - if there is a problem communicating with HBase.
        IllegalStateException - if all possible IDs are already assigned.
        IllegalStateException - if the ID found in HBase is encoded on the wrong number of bytes.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.2

      • getOrCreateIdAsync

        public com.stumbleupon.async.Deferred<byte[]> getOrCreateIdAsync(String name,
                                                                 String metric,
                                                                 Map<String,String> tags)
        Finds the ID associated with a given name or creates it.

        The length of the byte array is fixed in advance by the implementation.

        参数:
        name - The name to lookup in the table or to assign an ID to.
        metric - Name of the metric associated with the UID for filtering.
        tags - Tag set associated with the UID for filtering.
        抛出:
        org.hbase.async.HBaseException - if there is a problem communicating with HBase.
        IllegalStateException - if all possible IDs are already assigned.
        IllegalStateException - if the ID found in HBase is encoded on the wrong number of bytes.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.3

      • suggest

        public List<String> suggest(String search)
                     throws org.hbase.async.HBaseException
        Attempts to find suggestions of names given a search term.

        This method is blocking. Its use within OpenTSDB itself is discouraged, please use suggestAsync(java.lang.String, int) instead.

        参数:
        search - The search term (possibly empty).
        返回:
        A list of known valid names that have UIDs that sort of match the search term. If the search term is empty, returns the first few terms.
        抛出:
        org.hbase.async.HBaseException - if there was a problem getting suggestions from HBase.

      • suggest

        public List<String> suggest(String search,
                            int max_results)
                     throws org.hbase.async.HBaseException
        Attempts to find suggestions of names given a search term.
        参数:
        search - The search term (possibly empty).
        max_results - The number of results to return. Must be 1 or greater
        返回:
        A list of known valid names that have UIDs that sort of match the search term. If the search term is empty, returns the first few terms.
        抛出:
        org.hbase.async.HBaseException - if there was a problem getting suggestions from HBase.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the count was less than 1
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0

      • suggestAsync

        public com.stumbleupon.async.Deferred<List<String>> suggestAsync(String search,
                                                                 int max_results)
        Attempts to find suggestions of names given a search term.
        参数:
        search - The search term (possibly empty).
        返回:
        A list of known valid names that have UIDs that sort of match the search term. If the search term is empty, returns the first few terms.
        抛出:
        org.hbase.async.HBaseException - if there was a problem getting suggestions from HBase.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.1

      • rename

        public void rename(String oldname,
                   String newname)
        Reassigns the UID to a different name (non-atomic).

        Whatever was the UID of oldname will be given to newname. oldname will no longer be assigned a UID.

        Beware that the assignment change is not atommic. If two threads or processes attempt to rename the same UID differently, the result is unspecified and might even be inconsistent. This API is only here for administrative purposes, not for normal programmatic interactions.

        参数:
        oldname - The old name to rename.
        newname - The new name.
        抛出:
        NoSuchUniqueName - if oldname wasn't assigned.
        IllegalArgumentException - if newname was already assigned.
        org.hbase.async.HBaseException - if there was a problem with HBase while trying to update the mapping.

      • deleteAsync

        public com.stumbleupon.async.Deferred<Object> deleteAsync(String name)
        Attempts to remove the mappings for the given string from the UID table as well as the cache. If used, the caller should remove the entry from all TSD caches as well.

        WARNING: This is a best attempt only method in that we'll lookup the UID for the given string, then issue two delete requests, one for each mapping. If either mapping fails then the cache can be re-populated later on with stale data. In that case, please run the FSCK utility.

        WARNING 2: This method will NOT delete time series data or TSMeta data associated with the UIDs. It only removes them from the UID table. Deleting a metric is generally safe as you won't query over it in the future. But deleting tag keys or values can cause queries to fail if they find data without a corresponding name.

        参数:
        name - The name of the UID to delete
        返回:
        A deferred to wait on for completion. The result will be null if successful, an exception otherwise.
        抛出:
        NoSuchUniqueName - if the UID string did not exist in storage
        IllegalStateException - if the TSDB wasn't set for this UID object
        从以下版本开始:
        2.2

        Returns a human readable string representation of the object.

      • uidToString

        public static String uidToString(byte[] uid)
        Converts a byte array to a hex encoded, upper case string with padding
        参数:
        uid - The ID to convert
        返回:
        the UID as a hex string
        抛出:
        NullPointerException - if the ID was null
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0

      • stringToUid

        public static byte[] stringToUid(String uid)
        Converts a hex string to a byte array If the uid is less than uid_length * 2 characters wide, it will be padded with 0s to conform to the spec. E.g. if the tagk width is 3 and the given uid string is "1", the string will be padded to "000001" and then converted to a byte array to reach 3 bytes. All uids are padded to 1 byte. If given "1", and uid_length is 0, the uid will be padded to "01" then converted.
        参数:
        uid - The UID to convert
        返回:
        The UID as a byte array
        抛出:
        NullPointerException - if the ID was null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the string is not valid hex
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0

      • uidToLong

        public static long uidToLong(String uid,
                             short uid_length)
        Converts a UID to an integer value. The array must be the same length as uid_length or an exception will be thrown.
        参数:
        uid - The hex encoded UID to convert
        uid_length - Length the array SHOULD be according to the UID config
        返回:
        The UID converted to an integer
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the length of the byte array does not match the uid_length value
        从以下版本开始:
        2.1

      • uidToLong

        Converts a UID to an integer value. The array must be the same length as uid_length or an exception will be thrown.
        参数:

        从以下版本开始:

        参数:

        public static UniqueId.UniqueIdType stringToUniqueIdType(String type)

        参数:

        返回:
        a valid UniqueIdType if matched
        抛出:

        从以下版本开始:
        2.0

      • stringToUid

        public static byte[] stringToUid(String uid,
                                 short uid_length)
        Converts a hex string to a byte array If the uid is less than uid_length * 2 characters wide, it will be padded with 0s to conform to the spec. E.g. if the tagk width is 3 and the given uid string is "1", the string will be padded to "000001" and then converted to a byte array to reach 3 bytes. All uids are padded to 1 byte. If given "1", and uid_length is 0, the uid will be padded to "01" then converted.
        参数:
        uid - The UID to convert
        uid_length - An optional length, in bytes, that the UID must conform to. Set to 0 if not used.
        返回:
        The UID as a byte array
        抛出:
        NullPointerException - if the ID was null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the string is not valid hex
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0

      • getTSUIDFromKey

        public static byte[] getTSUIDFromKey(byte[] row_key,
                                     short metric_width,
                                     short timestamp_width)
        Extracts the TSUID from a storage row key that includes the timestamp.
        参数:
        row_key - The row key to process
        metric_width - The width of the metric
        timestamp_width - The width of the timestamp
        返回:
        The TSUID as a byte array
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the row key is missing tags or it is corrupt such as a salted key when salting is disabled or vice versa.

      • getTagsFromTSUID

        public static List<byte[]> getTagsFromTSUID(String tsuid)
        Extracts a list of tagks and tagvs as individual values in a list
        参数:
        tsuid - The tsuid to parse
        返回:
        A list of tagk/tagv UIDs alternating with tagk, tagv, tagk, tagv
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the TSUID is malformed
        从以下版本开始:
        2.1

        A list of tagk/tagv UID pairs
        抛出:

        从以下版本开始:

      • getUsedUIDs

        public static com.stumbleupon.async.Deferred<Map<String,Long>> getUsedUIDs(TSDB tsdb,
                                                                           byte[][] kinds)
        Returns a map of max UIDs from storage for the given list of UID types
        参数:
        tsdb - The TSDB to which we belong
        kinds - A list of qualifiers to fetch
        返回:
        A map with the "kind" as the key and the maximum assigned UID as the value
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0

      • preloadUidCache

        public static void preloadUidCache(TSDB tsdb,
                                   org.hbase.async.Bytes.ByteMap<UniqueId> uid_cache_map)
                            throws org.hbase.async.HBaseException
        Pre-load UID caches, scanning up to "tsd.core.preload_uid_cache.max_entries" rows from the UID table.
        参数:
        tsdb - The TSDB to use
        uid_cache_map - A map of UniqueId objects keyed on the kind.
        抛出:
        org.hbase.async.HBaseException - Passes any HBaseException from HBase scanner.
        RuntimeException - Wraps any non HBaseException from HBase scanner.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.1
